channel.title: Computer Vision on Xiyu Zhai
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on Xiyu Zhai

item.title: Robotics Hand Design
item.description:
• Designed and built a robotic hand with 16 degrees of freedom using 3d printer.

  • Implemented the real-time control of the robotic hand to imitating gestures using Node.js with a Leap Motion

  • Built a deep learning model with TensorFlow that can recognize the key points of hands from images taken by a regular camera within 25 milliseconds (improve from 110ms).
